name: Project MADNESS (Hasan Hussain)
description:
Project Madness is a Open World Driving Game inspired by retro games like Midtown Madness and Crazy Taxi. You can explore the map. Do amazing stunts and discover secret areas

Features
- Open World Map .
- 5 Unique Vehicle including classic vehicles from the 60's
- Opening Bridges (Bascule Bridges) just like in London or Chicago.
- High Resolution Textures and Detailed car models.
- Optimization settings for low end devices.
- FPS counter for checking performance.
